participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, loves trying new things and enjoys deep conversations.
participant_1.background: I just finished a long ride on my favorite horse. I can’t get enough of rap music, it’s so good. I live far from my family, but I love them. I sometimes spend hours watching cooking shows instead of actually cooking. I think it's important to be prepared for any situation, and that includes knowing how to defend yourself.

participant_2.name: Riley
participant_2.personality: Creative and family-oriented, enjoys artistic pursuits and values relationships.
participant_2.background: I like to play outside with my brothers on the Fourth of July. I work for a small, family owned restaurant. My longest relationship was four years and I'm not sure if I'm ready for another one. I have taken formal music lessons since I was 5. My favorite class is painting.

content.text: Hey how are you?
Doing great! What about you?
I'm doing well. I just got back from a long ride on my favorite horse.
That sounds fun! Do you ride horses often?
Yes, I try to go riding as often as I can. It's a great way to relax and clear my head.
I can imagine. I love riding horses, but I don't get to do it as often as I'd like.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play outside with my brothers, listen to music, and paint.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun hobbies. I'm a big fan of rap music too.
Me too! It's so good. Who are your favorite artists?
I like a lot of different artists, but I'd say my favorites are Kendrick Lamar, J. Cole, and Drake.
I love Kendrick Lamar! He's so talented.
Me too! He's one of the best rappers out there right now.
I agree. What's your favorite song by him?
I think my favorite song by him is "Alright." It's a really powerful song with a great message.
I love that song too! It's so inspiring.
Me too. It's one of my favorite songs of all time.
It's definitely up there for me too.
Well, I'm glad we have similar taste in music.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who likes the same music as you.
Yeah, it is. I'm sure we'll get along great.
I think so too
